import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './login.css' import React from 'react' import { baseUrl } from '../../api/api' import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const history = useNavigate() const signupSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8989/api/token/', { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ 'email':e.target.email.value, 'password':e.target.password.value }) }) let data = await response.json() if(response.status === 200){ localStorage.setItem('authToken', JSON.stringify(data)) history('/') }else if(response.status === 401){ alert('User credentials mismatch') history('/') } } return (

Login Here

signupSubmit(e)} >

Don't yet registered? history('/register')} >SignUp here

) } export default Login
